main event: A UFO sighting was reported at Cape Thompson, Alaska, on July 3, 1953, involving red, green, and orange flashes observed through clouds.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 30 seconds,The report mentions that there was a reliable observer,The sighting was made by 107 CASU personnel,People in the area reported similar sightings,The object was reported as being stationary.
sighted object: flashes of red, green, and orange light through clouds
